document.full_text: bubba watson maintained ice-cool composure to clinch his third pga tour title in a gripping playoff with fellow american webb simpson at the new orleans classic on sunday.
document.title: watson beats simpson in playoff for new orleans classic
lines_and_colors: bubba watson maintained ice-cool composure to clinch his third pga tour title in a gripping playoff with fellow american webb simpson at the new orleans classic on sunday.
